Pre-Installation

Download

  1. Download debian ISO:
    • Debian netinstall ISO ⇒ debian-<VERSION>-amd64-netinst.iso
    • Debian netinstall ISO with 3rd party firmware ⇒ firmware-<VERSION>-amd64-netinst.iso

Verify Download

To do.

Flash USB

  1. Make sure the USB filesystem is not mounted!
  2. Flash USB with disk image: 

    # dd if=<DEBIAN>.iso of=</dev/sdX> bs=4M ; sync

USB Boot

  1. Reboot the system and during the POST phase press BIOS key1) to boot into UEFI.
  2. Make sure that Secure Boot is disabled and reboot.
  3. On next POST phase, press Boot Menu key2) and select (UEFI) USB entry.
1) , 2)
List of POST keys according to vendor: http://www.disk-image.com/faq-bootmenu.htm.
